```{r}
pacman::p_load(ggplot2, tidyverse,readxl)
```

```{r}
data1 <- read_excel("data/outputFile.xlsx",sheet='T1',range = 'A10:UT129')
data1
```

```{r}
data1A <- data1 %>% 
  separate("Data Series", c("Place", "money"), " ")
data1A
```

```{r}
  data1A |>
  select(Place:"2020 Jan") |>
  filter(money=="(Million") |>
  head(n=5) |>
  knitr::kable()
```
